title: inter-node capability with NCCL1
body_html:
Issue description

Hi there, I've installed pytorch from pip. After searching the internet I find that NCCL1 is not designed for inter-node communication.
But amazingly I succeed to run the inter-node all-reduce when using the pre-built NCCL1 backend.
The nodes are connected by both IB network and Ethernet.

## Issue description

Hi there, I've installed pytorch from `pip`. After searching the internet I find that NCCL1 is not designed for inter-node communication.
But amazingly I succeed to run the inter-node `all-reduce` when using the pre-built NCCL1 backend. 
The nodes are connected by both IB network and Ethernet.
